Amount.description: Amount of the payment credit transaction.

ClientContext.description: Additional information about the payment credit transaction.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization.

ExternalReference.description: Reference ID used to track the payment credit transaction.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

PaymentCreditTransactionNumber.description: Number of the payment credit transaction. This field is automatically generated.

Status.description: A static enum showing the status of the credit transaction.
